Welcome to django_admin's documentation!
========================================

This app has the back in Django 3.2 and the frrnt in Angular 11

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Django 3.2:
===========
* Admin de Django
* Overrides html y css
* Sphinx

.. figure:: /images/django-logo.png
   :scale: 5%
   :alt: django
   :align: center

* Routing
* Material Design
